review: It works as advertised. Once the free month of Amazon prime runs out its going to limit the choices by a lot.  I wish there were a few more apps from the Amazon app store or any from the play store that it would allow.  The availability to stream current TV/movies is based on how much you'd like to spend on rentals, and what cable company you have (many apps are based on you having regular access to that channel already.. AMC, AE, Disc, etc). I guess sideloading is always an option...
